revised_title: Obituary of Sir James Hopwood Jeans: A Pioneering Mathematician, Physicist, and Astronomer
tldr: This obituary celebrates the life and achievements of Sir James Hopwood Jeans, a renowned mathematician, physicist, and astronomer. Jeans made significant contributions to various fields, including cosmogony, stellar dynamics, and the theory of gases. He authored several influential textbooks and received numerous awards and honors throughout his career. His legacy continues to inspire generations of scientists.
